item.title: Why Live Streaming Video from Remote Oilfields is a Bad Idea
item.dc:creator: Pixel Velocity
item.description:
Remote video monitoring is needed in the oil and gas industry to reduce windshield time, improve safety, and scale worker productivity. However, some solutions require video to be streamed to the cloud or a data center. Is that the best solution? No. Live streaming video to the cloud may seem to be an appealing choice, [...]

The post Why Live Streaming Video from Remote Oilfields is a Bad Idea appeared first on Pixel Velocity.

item.title: Managing Video in Remote Oilfields
item.dc:creator: Pixel Velocity
item.description:
By Steve Fleischmann, V.P. Business Development, Pixel Velocity and Jonathan Murray, CEO, Pixel Velocity Published October 10, 2019 The oil and gas industry is continuously looking for operational efficiencies to reduce costs, improve profits, and improve safety practices. One approach is to use video and audio, in addition to other sensors, to monitor remote locations. [...]

item.title: Detect Gas Leaks Remotely in Real Time
item.dc:creator: Pixel Velocity
item.description:
Hydrocarbon leaks are an ongoing challenge in oil and gas production, processing, storage and delivery. Asset integrity programs strive tirelessly to protect the public, workers, corporate reputations, and stakeholder value. A cost-effective tool that helps operators detect leaks and prevent larger problems has significant value. Pixel Velocity has a software solution that transforms proven optical [...]

The post Detect Gas Leaks Remotely in Real Time appeared first on Pixel Velocity.

item.title: Digitizing Field Service in the Oil and Gas Industry
item.dc:creator: Pixel Velocity
item.description:
Remote oil and gas assets are largely managed through routine site visits by operators who drive company-owned vehicles on scheduled routes at scheduled frequencies. This is inefficient, expensive, and wasteful. Many sites do not need routine visits. Events that require attention may not occur when an operator is on site. The cost of visiting low-producing [...]

The post Digitizing Field Service in the Oil and Gas Industry appeared first on Pixel Velocity.
